action.text: Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Amendment SA 4051 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 4050 (the instructions of the motion to refer). (consideration: CR S6698; text: CR S6698) Of a perfecting nature.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4051 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 4050 (the instructions of the motion to refer).
